definition: to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
to hook/to sew/to crochet/hook/check mark or tick/window catch

sentences.english: Please check if the company holds below liabilities.
sentences.chinese: 如公司有以下的负债项目，请打钩。

sentences.english: Please check if the company holds below asset(s).
sentences.chinese: 如公司持有以下的资产，请打钩。

sentences.english: Check their names off (the list) as the students arrive.
sentences.chinese: 学生到时逐一在名单上打钩。

sentences.english: Eg: He ticked the items one by one.
sentences.chinese: 他逐个在项目前面打钩。

sentences.english: Please check off those parcels before they are despatched.
sentences.chinese: 那些包裹发出之前请一一核对打钩。

sentences.english: The list is in no particular order. Tick the little box in front of the poem's name.
sentences.chinese: 作品排序不分前后，请在作品名称前的框内打钩。
所以啊，再次在“删除我的账号”上打钩吧。

sentences.english: Please tick the box which most closely describes your ethnic background.
sentences.chinese: 请在以下正确描述你的族群信息的方格里打钩。

sentences.english: Look and read. Put a tick or a cross in the box.
sentences.chinese: 看图片和句子，在后面的方框打钩或叉。

sentences.english: Tick the little box in front of the poem's name.
sentences.chinese: 作品排序不分前后，请在作品名称前的框内打钩。

sentences.english: Every month, just check in a grid.
sentences.chinese: 每过一个月，就在一个格子里打钩。

sentences.english: The conference staff required the attendees to put a check after their names.
sentences.chinese: 会务人员要求到会人在自己的名字后面打钩。
请在下面适当的空格打钩。

definition: tick/check mark (✓)/number for verification (serial number, seat number etc)/(fig.) two things match up

pinyin: ping2 mu4 bao3 hu4 cheng2 xu4

definition: Save As ... (menu option in a software application)
to make a choice (between several alternatives)/a choice/an option/an alternative
